C

ChiSquare - Class in org.radartools.detection
A chi-square distribution model suitable for calculation of radar probability of detection (PD) for a given signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) and a given Noise model.
ChiSquare(double, double, int, int) - Constructor for class org.radartools.detection.ChiSquare
Constructor given signal-to-noise ratio and detection threshold
ChiSquare(double, Probability, int, int) - Constructor for class org.radartools.detection.ChiSquare
Constructor given signal-to-noise ratio and probability of false alarm
ChiSquare(Probability, double, int, int) - Constructor for class org.radartools.detection.ChiSquare
Constructor given probability of detection and detection threshold
ChiSquare(Probability, Probability, int, int) - Constructor for class org.radartools.detection.ChiSquare
Constructor given probability of detection and probability of false alarm
